column3: 2015 from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM at Sims Funeral Home. Funeral Services will be held Monday
column5: 2015 at 2:00 PM at Bethany Holiness Baptist Church with the Rev. Kenneth Matthews and the Rev. Joe Vaughn officiating. Interment will follow in the Bethany Holiness Baptist Church Cemetery. Sims Funeral Home in charge of arrangements.
